com.azure.core.util.tracing

Interface Tracer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OpenTelemetryTracer

    public interface Tracer
    Contract that all tracers must implement to be plug-able into the SDK.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DIAGNOSTIC_ID_KEY
      Key for Context which indicates that the context contains the Diagnostic Id for the service call.
      static String ENTITY_PATH
      Key for Context which indicates that the context contains the Entity Path, remote endpoint path.
      static String HOST_NAME
      Key for Context which indicates that the context contains the hostname.
      static String OPENTELEMETRY_SPAN_KEY
      Key for Context which indicates that the context contains OpenTelemetry span data.
      static String OPENTELEMETRY_SPAN_NAME_KEY
      Key for Context which indicates that the context contains the name for the OpenTelemetry spans that are created.
      static String SPAN_CONTEXT
      Key for Context which indicates that the context contains message Span Context.

    • Field Detail

      • OPENTELEMETRY_SPAN_KEY

        static final String OPENTELEMETRY_SPAN_KEY
        Key for Context which indicates that the context contains OpenTelemetry span data. This span will be used as the parent span for all spans the SDK creates. If no span data is listed when the SDK creates its first span it will be used as the parent for all further spans it creates.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OPENTELEMETRY_SPAN_NAME_KEY

        static final String OPENTELEMETRY_SPAN_NAME_KEY
        Key for Context which indicates that the context contains the name for the OpenTelemetry spans that are created. If no span name is listed when the span is created it will default to using the calling method's name.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ENTITY_PATH

        static final String ENTITY_PATH
        Key for Context which indicates that the context contains the Entity Path, remote endpoint path.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HOST_NAME

        static final String HOST_NAME
        Key for Context which indicates that the context contains the hostname.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SPAN_CONTEXT

        static final String SPAN_CONTEXT
        Key for Context which indicates that the context contains message Span Context.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DIAGNOSTIC_ID_KEY

        static final String DIAGNOSTIC_ID_KEY
        Key for Context which indicates that the context contains the Diagnostic Id for the service call.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • start

        Context start(String methodName,
              Context context)
        Creates a new tracing span. The context will be checked for containing information about a parent span. If a parent span is found the new span will be added as a child, otherwise the span will be created and added to the context and any downstream start calls will use the created span as the parent.
        Parameters:
        methodName - Name of the method triggering the span creation.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.
        Returns:
        An updated context object.

      • start

        Context start(String methodName,
              Context context,
              com.azure.core.implementation.tracing.ProcessKind processKind)
        Creates a new tracing span. The context will be checked for containing information about a parent span. If a parent span is found the new span will be added as a child, otherwise the span will be created and added to the context and any downstream start calls will use the created span as the parent.
        Parameters:
        methodName - Name of the method triggering the span creation.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.
        processKind - AMQP message process kind.
        Returns:
        An updated context object.

      • end

        void end(int responseCode,
         Throwable error,
         Context context)
        Completes the current tracing span.
        Parameters:
        responseCode - Response status code if the span is in a HTTP call context.
        error - Potential throwable that happened during the span.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.

      • end

        void end(String errorCondition,
         Throwable error,
         Context context)
        Completes the current tracing span.
        Parameters:
        errorCondition - the error message that occurred during the call.
        error - Potential throwable that happened during the span.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.

      • setAttribute

        void setAttribute(String key,
                  String value,
                  Context context)
        Adds metadata to the current span. The context is checked for having span information, if no span information is found in the context no metadata is added.
        Parameters:
        key - Name of the metadata.
        value - Value of the metadata.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.

      • setSpanName

        Context setSpanName(String spanName,
                    Context context)
        Configures the name for spans that are created.
        Parameters:
        spanName - Name to give the next span.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.
        Returns:
        An updated context object.

      • addLink

        void addLink(Context context)
        Adds a link to the tracing span. Used in batching operations to relate multiple requests under a single batch.
        Parameters:
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.

      • extractContext

        Context extractContext(String diagnosticId,
                       Context context)
        Extracts the span's Context from the given event's diagnostic id.
        Parameters:
        diagnosticId - Unique identifier for the trace information of the span.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.
        Returns:
        An updated context object.
